com.serialpundit.serial.mapper

Class SerialComPortMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.serialpundit.serial.mapper.SerialComPortMapper

  • public final class SerialComPortMapper
extends java.lang.Object

    Provides methods to create and remove alias for serial ports is system.

    Author:
    Rishi Gupta

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SerialComPortMapper(SerialComPortMapperJNIBridge mSerialComPortMapperJNIBridge)
      Construct and allocates a new SerialComPortMapper object with given details.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> listCreatedAliases()
      Provides caller with a read-only Map view of the aliases created using SerialPundit.

      Creates a alias to the given existing serial port.
      boolean startMappingService()
      Start the service which may run with elevated privileges in system.

      Stops the serial port mapping service when no more required.

        public SerialComPortMapper(SerialComPortMapperJNIBridge mSerialComPortMapperJNIBridge)

        Construct and allocates a new SerialComPortMapper object with given details.

        mSerialComPortMapperJNIBridge - interface class to native library for calling platform specific routines.
        Throws:
        com.serialpundit.core.SerialComException - if the object can not be constructed.

    • Method Detail

      • startMappingService

        public boolean startMappingService()
                            throws com.serialpundit.core.SerialComException

        Start the service which may run with elevated privileges in system.

        Returns:
        true if the service was started successfully.
        Throws:
        com.serialpundit.core.SerialComException - if an error occurs.

      • stopMappingService

        public boolean stopMappingService()
                           throws com.serialpundit.core.SerialComException

        Stops the serial port mapping service when no more required. This increase the security if this serialpundit is running on servers.

        Returns:
        true if the service was started successfully.
        Throws:
        com.serialpundit.core.SerialComException - if an error occurs.

      • mapAliasToExistingComPort

        public boolean mapAliasToExistingComPort(java.lang.String alias,
                                java.lang.String comPort)
                                  throws com.serialpundit.core.SerialComException

        Creates a alias to the given existing serial port.

        Parameters:
        alias - created name that maps to existing serial port.
        comPort - actual existing serial port which is mapped.
        Returns:
        true on success.
        Throws:
        com.serialpundit.core.SerialComException - if alias can not be created or an I/O error occurs.

      • unmapAliasToExistingComPort

        public boolean unmapAliasToExistingComPort(java.lang.String alias)
                                    throws com.serialpundit.core.SerialComException

        Removes a previously created alias to the given existing serial port.

        Parameters:
        alias - created name that maps to existing serial port.
        Returns:
        true on success.
        Throws:
        com.serialpundit.core.SerialComException - if given alias is unknown to this library, or if given alias can not be removed or an I/O error occurs.

      • listCreatedAliases

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> listCreatedAliases()

        Provides caller with a read-only Map view of the aliases created using SerialPundit.

        Returns:
        Map view of the aliases created using SerialPundit.
